def_cn: （足球、曲棍球等比赛中）越位的
def_en: In games such as football or hockey, when an attacking player is offside, they have broken the rules by being nearer to the goal than a defending player when the ball is passed to them.
In American football, a player is offside if they cross the line of scrimmage before a play begins.

def_cn: （车辆在靠左交通中的）右侧，外侧，远离路边的一侧
def_en: The offside of a vehicle is the side that is farthest from the edge of the road when the vehicle is being driven normally.
